messages.content: Videos and 360 degrees photos are old fashion .. AR/VR is the future of real estate
Whenever a customer shows interest in your property, you can take first step and send your sales team with VR headset to customerâs house and show them your property
With all the amenities like swimming pool, clubhouse
Yes definitely.. we can show your lands like how they will look once complete construction is done
Do you think we can fit there with AR/VR?
Currently we are planning drone plus edit.
My use case is - to better present lands.
We also have another product - Augmented reality app, where you can show your under construction properties or just on a mobile or tab to clients ..
Can i please know your convenient time and date to meet and discuss further on this ?

Sure. We can see the demo.
